BootstrapTextblock.Title: OpenCms Introduction: Step 5 - Publish your changes

Text.name: Text0
Text.content:
OpenCms features an integrated staging mechanism. This means changes made to the content are not immediatly visible to the public. They need to be published first. 

To publish changes, click on the "Publish" icon on the left side of the toolbar. The OpenCms publish dialog appears. Here you can select what you want to publish. The dialog allows publishing of just the current page, or all changes you have made in your current session, or all changes at all.
